0111001101011011 0100011001001000 1 -> sum: 1011100110100100, cout: 0
0100101101011010 1000001011011000 1 -> sum: 1100111000110011, cout: 0
1101000101110011 0111101001101100 0 -> sum: 0100101111011111, cout: 1
0110110000011100 1111000011000100 0 -> sum: 0101110011100000, cout: 1
0011011101100000 1000010101001110 1 -> sum: 1011110010101111, cout: 0
0010001000000111 0110111110010101 0 -> sum: 1001000110011100, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
